name: reprehensibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an extremely bad or unacceptable way: He behaves reprehensibly at times. I think they've handled this situation reprehensibly. See
reprehensible
More examplesFewer examplesMore reprehensibly, false allegations have been made to newspapers.She was treated reprehensibly by the management.Fear made her act reprehensibly.
